 Megaton threw Mustex off his back,but quickly realized he was in no 
condition to take on Megatron, or Mustex. He also realized that if he 
returned to his own time for repairs the trans-warp celll that 
brought him here would not have enough power for him to return. So he 
made the only possible choice and ran. He now had 2 enemies in his 
own time he would have to go after. Mustex(and his son),and Megatron 
would both someday feel his wrath, but for now he needed to be 
repaired.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  Mustex couldn't believe he had been so stupid(or that he had 
gotten 
> this far without any complaints). With his sword spinning he jumped

>
